content: I'll start by setting a realistic goal for my bedtime and wake-up time, and then gradually adjust my sleep schedule. I'll also try to establish a relaxing bedtime routine, starting with reading a book or listening to calming music before bed. Additionally, I want to focus on creating a sleep-conducive environment by making my bedroom darker and quieter. I've also been meaning to start a journaling practice, so I might incorporate that into my bedtime routine as well.
